title: Emerald Kundan Grand Haaram with Ruby Pendant
materials: 22K Gold (సువర్ణం) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features high-quality Polki Diamonds
and a Central Ruby (మాణిక్యం) of exceptional clarity. Diamond quality: VVS clarity
features: A breathtaking three-layered Haaram, meticulously handcrafted with intricate Kundan setting. The emeralds are square cut and set within the second layer, while the other two layers are adorned with brilliant Polki diamonds. A large, pear-shaped Ruby pendant adds a touch of regal charm. The pendant setting features intricate filigree work.
colors: the vibrant green of the emeralds
the fiery red of the ruby pendant and the bright white of the polki diamonds creating a rich
occasions: or any grand occasion where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of Polki diamonds, emeralds, and a vibrant Ruby pendant creates a piece that is both elegant and culturally significant. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and antique appeal. A true heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
